title: feat: hidden model support, remove Claude fallbacks, add claude-legacy
author: voodoohop

gist.summary: Introduces support for hidden models in the registry and streamlines Claude integration configurations.
gist.impact: Developers can now access legacy models via API without cluttering the main dashboard, while Claude models receive optimized direct routing.
gist.visual_concept: The pollinations.ai bee discovering a secret, glowing book in a cozy pixel art library. This represents the 'hidden' models that are accessible if you know where to look (the API), without cluttering the main shelves (the UI).
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the pollinations.ai bee pulling a glowing lime green book from a library shelf, revealing a secret passage. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Represents hidden model access. Nostalgic but beautiful.
